text: Ferman Akgül (born 25 December 1979 in Ankara) is a Turkish songwriter and the singer of the rock band maNga. He writes both lyrics and music. Ferman Akgül was born in Ankara and went to the Ankara Anatolian High School. He began playing classical guitar at the age of 9-10. ==References== Category:1979 births Category:Living people Category:Turkish singers Category:People from Ankara
title: Ferman Akgül
